name: Ami Kagura
disclosureNotes: A post on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/posts/ibrucehamilton_today-were-excited-to-introduce-ami-kagura-activity-7398772135286075392-7AYt states: "Ami Kagura is our first Persona artist at Everybody. Ami represents what’s possible when human imagination and generative tools work together. Behind every Persona is a team of writers, designers, producers, and strategists shaping the character’s voice, story, aesthetic, and world."
